text: Dave Clarke (born February 14, 1950) was a Canadian football player who played for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. He played college football at the University of Guelph.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=clarkdav002 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Guelph Gryphons football players
title: Dave Clarke (Canadian football)
